This pilot study directly compare transabdominal transvaginal digoxin respect patient preference ( i.e , patient pain score describe discomfort injection ) .
DOC.brief_title: Transvaginal Versus Transabdominal Digoxin Prior Second-trimester Abortion
DOC.criteria: Age great equal 18 year Singleton viable gestation Identifying primarily Englishspeaking Body mass index less 40 kilograms/meters square Already consent patient secondtrimester abortion procedure digoxin perform termination pregnancy study site No medical contraindication digoxin ( i.e. , cardiac dysfunction , renal dysfunction , hypersensitivity digoxin )
